name: freementors
description: Free Mentors is a social initiative where accomplished professionals become role models to young people to provide free mentorship sessions.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run drop && NODE_ENV=test npm run create && NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha ./server/tests/*.js --require @babel/register --timeout 10000000 --exit
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install && npm run build
scripts.start-test: NODE_ENV=test npm run drop && NODE_ENV=test npm run create && NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha ./server/tests/*.js --require @babel/register --timeout 10000000 --exit
scripts.test-session: NODE_ENV=test npm run drop && NODE_ENV=test npm run create && NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha ./server/tests/session.test.js --require @babel/register --timeout 10000000 --exit
